annotations.juggler_description: {{alert.name}} is in {{status.code}} state. {{#isAlarm}} SSD Read 90: {{expression.ssd_r_90}} | SSD Write 90: {{expression.ssd_w_90}} | SSD Zero 90: {{expression.ssd_z_90}} | HDD Read 90: {{expression.hdd_r_90}} | HDD Write 90: {{expression.hdd_w_90}} | HDD Zero 90: {{expression.hdd_z_90}}{{/isAlarm}}
